          <title>
            <string language="de">April 23 Kindertag</string>
            <string language="en">April 23 Children’s Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour Avril 23 De Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia De Abril 23 Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno Aprile 23 Di Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">23 Απριλίου ημέρα Children?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día De Abril 23 Del Children?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Einführende Informationen über den "Kindertag" (oder auch "Weltkindertag" am 23. April, seine Geschichte und Bedeutung</string>
            <string language="en">Introductory information about the "Children's Day" April 23, its history and meaning</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Informations préliminaires sur jour "avril 23 le"
des enfants, son histoire et signification</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação introdutória sobre o dia "abril 23 
das" crianças, seu history e meaning</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni introduttive sul giorno "il 23" 
dei bambini aprile, sulla relativa storia e sul significato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγικές πληροφορίες για την ημέρα "23" των 
παιδιών Απριλίου, την ιστορία και τη σημασία του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Información introductoria sobre día "de abril el
23 el" de los niños, su historia y el significado</string>
          </description>
